caption.p: Effect of the IC 50 values of the four plant extracts and 50 µM positive control (FCCP) on the MMP of HeLa cells after 24h. Un-treated cells representing the negative control. ( A) Fluorescence Intensity after 24 h treatment, ( B) Analysis of fold Change of MMP. Values expressed in mean ± standard deviation (SD). ( C) Fluorescence Images after 24 h treatment, visualize the breakdown of MPP after treatment of HeLa cells with the IC 50 of the four studied plant extracts, followed by staining by 500 nM of TMRE.
